package.name: UK_Postcode_Address_Finder
package.summary: UK address auto completion functionality. Uses CraftyClicks.co.uk web service to lookup address from a postcode.
package.description:
This extension provides auto completion functionality on all postal address forms. Shoppers simply enter their postcode and are given a list of matching addresses to select from. Address entry is greatly speeded up thus improving the user experience.
The benefits for the merchant are lower drop off rates on checkout/registration and improved quality of address data captured.
Please note:
1. This extension currently only works for UK postcodes. If country selected is not UK, the 'find address' button is not shown.
2. The extension is free to try and install, but to go live a paid up account with CraftyClicks.co.uk will be required. For current prices please go to http://www.craftyclicks.co.uk/prices
